casebody.data:
State ex rel. St. Clair Twp. Bd. of Trustees
v.
Hamilton 2017-0563 Supreme Court of Ohio. June 27, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Mandamus. Sua sponte, alternative writ granted. The following briefing schedule is set for presentation of evidence and filing of briefs pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. 12.05. The parties shall file any evidence they intend to present within 20 days; relator shall file a brief within 10 days after the filing of the evidence; respondent shall file a brief within 20 days after the filing of relator's brief; and relator may file a reply brief within 7 days after the filing of respondent's brief. On relator's motion for issuance of peremptory writ of mandamus and request for reference of case to commissioner. Motion and request denied. On respondent's motion to dismiss. Motion denied. O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, French, Fischer, DeWine, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur. Kennedy, J., not participating.
